alert.note: Alert for Chester; Decatur; Hardeman; Hardin; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:29AM CDT until August 07 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henderson County in west Tennessee... East central Hardeman County in west Tennessee... McNairy County in west Tennessee... Hardin County in west Tennessee... Southeastern Madison County in west Tennessee... Chester County in west Tennessee... Decatur County in west Tennessee... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 929 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mifflin to near Masseyville to 7 miles north of Pocahontas, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Savannah, Henderson, Selmer, Parsons, Adamsville, Decaturville, Sardis, Masseyville, Reagan, Jacks Creek, Blue Goose, Mifflin, Morris Chapel, Shiloh, Olive Hill, Darden, Montgomery, Robertson and McNairy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chester; Decatur; Hardeman; Hardin; Henderson; Madison; McNairy
